activities: Remedy Interactive electronically collects, utilizes and communicates non-public personal information about interested subjects provided through computer-usage statistics and/or by the employee themselves through an on-line questionnaire and communications with Remedy Interactive. These processes results in a report and suggestions to the data subject and their employer, or party to whom they provide services, intended to facilitate a more ergonomically comfortable work environment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
